text: Steve Young (born Jon Steven Young on October 11, 1961 in Salt Lake City, Utah), is a former quarterback for the NFL's San Francisco 49ers and Tampa Bay Buccaneers. He was named the Most Valuable Player of Super Bowl XXIX. He is now in the Pro Football Hall of Fame. == Other websites == *Pro Football Hall of Fame profile *Forever Young Foundation * *Young profile from ESPN * Category:College Football Hall of Fame Category:Pro Football Hall of Fame Category:San Francisco 49ers players Category:Tampa Bay Buccaneers players Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Salt Lake City, Utah
title: Steve Young
